thread.title: Choice Hotels CEO rappels 15 stories to raise awareness about addiction
thread.title_full: Choice Hotels CEO rappels 15 stories to raise awareness about addiction

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Choice Hotels CEO rappels 15 stories to raise awareness about addiction
text:
Choice Hotels CEO rappels 15 stories to raise awareness about addiction   30, 2015 Choice Hotels CEO rappels 15 stories to raise awareness about addiction eTN   
ROCKVILLE, MD - Steve Joyce, President and CEO, Choice Hotels International, rappels down 15 stories at the 2 Bethesda Metro Center to raise awareness for Shatterproof, an organization dedicated to transforming the way our nation helps prevent and treat addiction. 
Mr. Joyce was joined by more than 50 Choice employees who rappelled themselves or came to cheer him on and help raise awareness about the cause.
